subject: issue with order #SSN5153
description_text:
goodmorning,
I received yesterday my new simsonn pro x ultra pedal with haptic reactors,
once set them up on my sim rig I turned on the pc and connected the pedals
hub with the power supply and usb cable.

In the device center the pedals were detected in "update" mode or something
like that and after a few moments they were no longer detected while the
usb hub was smelling bad and a little smoke was coming out from it.

It looks like the product was defective and something burned inside the usb
hub.

Can you please assist?
Michele

conversations.body_text: Hi Michele Pasquali,  We will send you a replacement control box. The issue may have been caused by impact during shipping, which could have affected the electronics.Â

ciao good morning,
thank you!

Michele
